## Summary Info

This data displays a few aspects of Disney movies. Such as the release dates, genre, MPAA rating, total gross income and inflation adjusted gross income. In this data the highest gross movie is `r Highest_Gross_Movie` *Star Wars Ep. VII: The Force Awakens*. Also, the lowest gross movies would be the movies `r Lowest_Gross_Movies`. With this being said, the most common genre from the data are `r Most_Common_Genre` and the most common release date year would be the `r Most_Common_Release_Year`. Finally, in this data it displays `r Total_Movies`. This can all be seen below.
```{r}
summary
```


## Summary Table

This table shows 10 Disney movies with the average inflation gross income of each movie. Included with this is the genre of each of these movies and the MPAA rating. This demonstrates if the movie genre and the MPAA affects the inflation gross income.
